A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is probably the weekest Star Wars movie of the franchise. I mean it has no story\, they misplay several Star Wars characters\, and there are many plot holes that easily could've been solved. And they killed off one the most beloved Star Wars characters\, Luke\, in such a cowardly way: He just sat there and meditated instead of facing Ben in person. So overall\, super disappointing.
